tasks.title: Fix timing attack vulnerability in API key validation
tasks.description: The validateApiKey function in src/db/index.ts uses simple equality comparison for API key hashes, which is vulnerable to timing attacks. Use crypto.timingSafeEqual() for secure comparison.

tasks.title: Add path traversal protection to storage API
tasks.description: The storage API's path sanitization is insufficient. Add path resolution validation (path.resolve + startsWith check) to all storage endpoints to prevent directory traversal attacks.

tasks.title: Implement rate limiting on authentication endpoints
tasks.description: The /api/login endpoint has no rate limiting, making it vulnerable to brute force attacks. Add rate limiting middleware (e.g., hono-rate-limiter) to prevent credential stuffing attacks.

tasks.title: Enforce API keys configuration in production
tasks.description: The default development API key 'dev-key-change-in-production' could accidentally be used in production. Add a startup check that refuses to run in production without proper API_KEYS configuration.

tasks.title: Implement Zod-based input validation
tasks.description: Zod is a dependency but not used. Implement Zod schemas for all API input validation to ensure consistent, type-safe validation across all endpoints. Add request size limits to prevent DoS attacks.
